item.title: Google Container Registry statistics from GCS access_logs
item.description: Sample flow to extract Google Container Registry usage statistics (image push/pull counts, analytics, etc). GCR images are hosted on Google Cloud Storage which does have the ability to export usage which means we can indirectly acquire GCR’s usage. There are several step sto getting the following pipeline to work but in is basic form, we setup GCS bucket used by GCR to export its usage stats to another GCS bucket.
